description:
Otomine Yuuna, a talented painter, was http://anidb.net/ch26380 [Yasuna]`s boyfriend until one year before the beginning of this story. He never was clear about what exactly Yasuna meant for him.
Actually he just moved to London and made Yasuna believe he was dead, with the help of their mutual friend http://anidb.net/ch26448 [Koharu-chan]; his sudden return to Japan in episode 3 makes sorting out the feelings of all major character in this story a rollercoaster.
name: Otomine Yuuma
